title: Ever since I broke up with my ex at around November 10th I've never been happier
body:
Kind off topic and I want to get it off my chest but seriously even though I am down to my last final exam and everything been so tiring since I have 8 am exams back to back I'm honestly happiest I can ever be ever since my ex broke up with me.

I'm starting to reconnect with a lot of my friends that I was forced to cut out now and it makes me so happy to talk to them and you know they're around and I have my own space to do whatever. I even got an good friend open to coach me because I want to go beyond shitty diamond 4 this season.

Nonetheless I'm pretty happy with where I'm at and I felt to share haha '- '  procrastinating studying
